summary: BE - Create Marketing Offerings API Documentation and Tests
description:
{panel:title=Overview|bgColor=#deebff}
Create comprehensive API documentation and test coverage for the Marketing Offerings APIs, ensuring proper validation of functionality, performance, and contract adherence.

Reference: [ADR-0008: Marketing Offerings APIs|https://github.com/pax8/sales-marketing/blob/main/docs/adr/0008-marketing-offerings-apis/README.md]
{panel}

{panel:title=Refinement Notes|bgColor=#eae6ff}
* OpenAPI/Swagger documentation required
* Integration test suite needed
* Contract tests for response formats
* Performance testing scenarios
* Error response validation
{panel}

{panel:title=Acceptance Criteria|bgColor=#e3fcef}
h3. API Documentation
* Create OpenAPI/Swagger documentation for:
** List endpoint with query parameters
** Details endpoint with path parameters
** All response schemas
** Error response formats
* Include authentication requirements
* Document permission requirements

h3. Integration Tests
* Test List endpoint:
** Pagination functionality
** Filtering options
** Sorting capabilities
** Response format validation

* Test Details endpoint:
** Valid offering retrieval
** Not found scenarios
** Response format validation

* Test Authorization:
** Permission validation
** Account level restrictions
** JWT token handling

h3. Contract Tests
* Validate response schemas match ADR specifications
* Verify error response formats
* Ensure consistent response structures

h3. Performance Tests
* Verify response times under load
* Test pagination with varying page sizes
* Validate filtering performance
{panel}
